mapper.sql: id, parentId, layers, enCode, fullName, icon, urlAddress, target, isMenu, isExpand, isPublic, allowEdit, allowDelete, sortCode, deleteMark, enabledMark, description, creatorTime, creatorUserId, lastModifyTime, lastModifyUserId, deleteTime, deleteUserId
mapper.select: select * from sys_module where parentid=#{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and deleteMark !=1
select * from sys_module where parentId=#{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and deleteMark != 1 ORDER BY sortCode ASC
select from sys_module where deleteMark != 1 and parentId='0' ORDER BY sortCode ASC

select
from sys_module
parentId Is not null and deleteMark =0
and enabledMark = 1
and id in ( select itemId from sys_roleauthorize where objectId = #{userRoleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and itemType=1 )

select
from sys_module where F_DeleteMark is null or F_DeleteMark =0
RIGHT JOIN (select F_Id f, F_ParentId f1 from sys_module where F_FullName like '%${fFullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}%') as a on Sys_Module.F_SortCode=a.f or Sys_Module.F_SortCode=a.f1 where Sys_Module.F_DeleteMark is null or Sys_Module.F_DeleteMark =0 group by

select
from sys_module where F_Id = #{fId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and F_DeleteMark =0
mapper.insert: insert into sys_Module (F_Id, F_ParentId, F_Layers, F_EnCode, F_FullName, F_Icon, F_UrlAddress, F_Target, F_IsMenu, F_IsExpand, F_IsPublic, F_AllowEdit, F_AllowDelete, F_SortCode, F_DeleteMark, F_EnabledMark, F_Description, F_CreatorTime, F_CreatorUserId, F_LastModifyTime, F_LastModifyUserId, F_DeleteTime, F_DeleteUserId) values (#{fId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fParentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fLayers,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fEncode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fFullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fUrladdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fTarget,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fIsmenu,jdbcType=BIT}, #{fIsexpand,jdbcType=BIT}, #{fIspublic,jdbcType=BIT}, #{fAllowedit,jdbcType=BIT}, #{fAllowdelete,jdbcType=BIT}, #{fSortcode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fDeletemark,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{fEnabledmark,jdbcType=BIT}, #{fDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fCreatortime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fCreatoruserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fLastmodifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fLastmodifyuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fDeletetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fDeleteuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
